alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 5:20PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lake County through 545 PM EDT... At 520 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Moss Bluff to near The Villages to near Inverness Airport. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Eustis, Lady Lake, Lake Griffin, and Lisbon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
